content.text: Good! I'm a teacher, and I just got off work. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm a musician and I love going to concerts.
I love concerts too! What kind of music do you like?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into rock and roll and country music.
I love rock and roll too! I'm not really into country music, but I'm sure I'd like it if I gave it a chance.
You should! I love how country music tells stories.
I love that about rock and roll too! I love how it can be so emotional and passionate.
It's the best! I love to get lost in the music.
Me too! I love to sing and dance along with my favorite songs.
Me too! I love to go to concerts and sing my heart out.
Me too! I love the energy of a live concert.
Me too! It's so much fun to be around other people who love music as much as you do.
I agree! It's the best feeling in the world.
